messages.title: Since Labour was elected in 1997
messages.content: Since Labour was elected in 1997 our schools, hospitals and police have all benefited from increased respect and investment. Labour has delivered on our election promises.

messages.title: Now, when faced with a global recession
messages.content: Now, when faced with a global recession, Labour will not leave you to fend for yourself. Labour knows that the best way to get the economy back into growth is to continue to support the services people need.

messages.title: This election sees a clear choice
messages.content: This election sees a clear choice between a Labour Government that will continue to invest in the recovery, and Conservative and Liberal Democrat proposals that would pull support from the economy just when it is needed most.

issues.economy: Labour knows that the best way to get the economy back into growth is to continue to support the services people need.
issues.education: Since Labour was elected in 1997 our schools have all benefited from increased respect and investment.
issues.health: Since Labour was elected in 1997 our hospitals have all benefited from increased respect and investment.

contactInformation.address: 1 Mosley Street, Newcastle upon Tyne NE1 1YE

leaflet.additionalNotes: Printed by Xpress Litho, Washington NE37 2SH. Promoted by D.L. Wood on behalf of Nick Brown both at 1 Mosley Street, Newcastle upon Tyne NE1 1YE.
